files.description: End-to-end test that sets OUTPUTS_DIR to a temporary directory and verifies that artifact writers emit their output files into that directory.

missionDescription: Implement an outputs_dir resolver (default ./outputs, override via OUTPUTS_DIR), refactor all writers to use it, and add a test that sets OUTPUTS_DIR to a temp directory and verifies artifacts are written there.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
